pullRequest.title: DOC Mapping updates are deprecated for ingestion privileges
pullRequest.bodyText:
I've forgot to adjust the docs and the migration notice following #58784 .
The text describes the deprecated behaviour in the next subsequent minor releases, which then turns into breaking behaviour in version 8, but the code (and the accompanying  notice) that it refers to, is still due. I will raise that PR promptly.

commit.message: Doc for Disallow mapping updates for doc ingestion privileges

nodes.bodyText:
This doesn't render properly as-is. The title needs to be on one line and right above the [%collapsible] attribute.
I also cut the part about this being allowed on indices but not data streams until 8.0.0.
Since data streams and this change are being introduced in the same release, it
doesn't seem worth mentioning.

  
    
      
        Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
            [discrete]
          
          
            
            [[deprecate_mapping_updates_for_ingest_privileges]]
          
          
            
            .The `create_doc`, `create`, `index` and `write` privileges deprecated allowing access
          
          
            
            to the update mapping action on indices. `create_doc`, `create` and `index`
          
          
            
            privileges also deprecated allowing {ref}/dynamic-mapping.html[dynamic mapping updates]
          
          
            
            on indices, which occur when ingesting documents with unmapped fields.
          
          
            
            
          
          
            
            [%collapsible]
          
          
            
            ====
          
          
            
            *Details* +
          
          
            
            The update mapping action on indices and data streams is not granted by the
          
          
            
            `create_doc`, `create`, `index` and `write` privileges in {es} 8.0.0. The action
          
          
            
            is however still allowed over indices (but not over data streams), on all
          
          
            
            releases until version 8.0.0, but a deprecation warning is hence issued.
          
          
            
            Moreover, the `create_doc`, `create` and `index` privileges do not grant
          
          
            
            the internal mapping action from {ref}/dynamic-mapping.html[dynamic mappings]
          
          
            
            in {es} 8.0.0. However, dynamic mapping updates are still allowed on all releases
          
          
            
            until version 8.0.0, but only on indices, in which case a deprecation warning is issued.
          
          
            
            
          
          
            
            *Impact* +
          
          
            
            Deprecation warnings are generated if mapping updates are granted only due to the
          
          
            
            deprecated behaviour described above.
          
          
            
            In most cases, the recommended alternative approach is to rely on index templates
          
          
            
            together with the `auto_configure` privilege, to only allow dynamic mapping updates
          
          
            
            according to the template mapping configuration and hence disallow explicit mapping
          
          
            
            update actions via the API.
          
          
            
            If explicit mapping updates must be allowed, the `manage` privilege must be granted.
          
          
            
            
          
          
            
            ====
          
          
            
            [discrete]
          
          
            
            [[deprecate_mapping_updates_for_ingest_privileges]]
          
          
            
            .Mapping actions have been deprecated for the `create_doc`, `create`, `index` and `write` privileges.
          
          
            
            [%collapsible]
          
          
            
            ====
          
          
            
            *Details* +
          
          
            
            In {es} 8.0.0, the following privileges will no longer allow users to
          
          
            
            explicitly update the mapping of an index:
          
          
            
            
          
          
            
            * `create_doc`
          
          
            
            * `create`
          
          
            
            * `index`
          
          
            
            * `write`
          
          
            
            
          
          
            
            Additionally, in {es} 8.0.0, the following privileges will no longer allow users to
          
          
            
            {ref}/dynamic-mapping.html[dynamic update the mapping] of an index 
          
          
            
            during indexing or ingest:
          
          
            
            
          
          
            
            * `create_doc`
          
          
            
            * `create`
          
          
            
            * `index`
          
          
            
            
          
          
            
            These privileges will continue to allow mapping actions on indices until {es} 8.0.0. However,
          
          
            
            deprecation warnings will be returned.
          
          
            
            
          
          
            
            *Impact* +
          
          
            
            To allow users to explicitly update the mapping of an index,
          
          
            
            grant the `manage` privilege.
          
          
            
            
          
          
            
            To dynamically update the mapping of an index during indexing or
          
          
            
            ingest, grant the `auto_configure` privilege and use index templates. This lets
          
          
            
            you dynamically update the index mapping based on the template's mapping configuration.
          
          
            
            ====
